info.title: Mavim iMprove
info.description: With the Mavim connector you are able to build a digital twin of your organization by visualizing the relationships among people, process and technology and creates a map of business operations to help you monitor change, measure impact, and make informed business decisions to help you reach your destination. Our cloud software makes use of open standards for integration with third party applications, enabling simple adoption into any companyâ€™s technology stack.

get.summary: Get the Charts of the topic
get.description: From a specific topic requested with the topic id, a collection of charts is returned.

post.description: A new topic is created as a sibling after the referenced topic.

delete.description: The specific topic requested by the topic id is deleted.

get.description: Get a specific topic by the DCV indentifier.

patch.summary: Updates the name of the topic
patch.description: Updates the name of a specific topic.

post.description: A new topic is created as a child of the referenced topic.

get.summary: Get the children of a topic
get.description: Get the children topics of the topic
From a specific topic requested with the topic id, a collection of fields is returned.

get.summary: Get the Relations of the topic
get.description: Get the Relations of the topic supplied by topic DCV ID.

post.description: Creates a relation between two topics.

delete.description: Deletes the relation by topic id and relationId.

get.description: Get the all topics in the path to the root topic.
